product_overview: VAYRA is a premium SaaS platform designed to help users manage debt, build savings, and generate income through AI-powered coaching and robust financial planning tools delivered via a secure, multilingual, plan-based web application with a polished and accessible UI/UX experience.
core_goals: Provide seamless and secure user authentication via Firebase with plan-based access control.
Deliver a premium, polished, and emotionally intelligent user interface that supports multi-language and multi-currency switching.
Implement a responsive and accessible PWA with offline capabilities that meets WCAG 2.1 AA compliance and scores ≥90 on Lighthouse audits for performance and accessibility.
Enable scalable and secure user plan management and access control based on Free, Starter, Pro, and Premium tiers.
Offer smooth navigation with protected routes and upgrade prompts based on subscription status.
Provide animated, visually polished branding with consistent VAYRA identity on the landing page, headers, and auth pages.
Ensure robust error handling and session persistence with friendly user feedback.
key_features: Firebase Authentication supporting email/password and Google OAuth sign-in with Firestore integration.
Landing page with animated hero section featuring the official VAYRA SVG logo and brand-compliant animations respecting user reduced-motion preferences.
Protected dashboard routing with sidebar navigation and plan gating that directs free users to upgrade pages.
Plan management component supporting subscription upgrade paths and feature gating based on user plan.
Reusable UI components including theme switcher, currency selector, language selector, and optimized accessible forms and buttons.
Progressive Web Application support with service worker registration, valid web manifest, and installable PWA icons including maskable PNGs.
Internationalization support with i18next enabling multiple languages and currency toggles.
Comprehensive error boundaries protecting the app with user-friendly fallback UI and detailed error feedback.
Accessibility enhancements including keyboard navigation, focus outlines, and screen reader-friendly attributes.
Performance optimizations ensuring no layout shifts on hero logo loading, minimal long tasks, and clean console/network logs.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage, sees a single animated VAYRA logo above the hero header, and can easily navigate to sign-in/signup pages.
New or returning users authenticate via email/password or Google sign-in, triggering Firestore user doc creation with default free plan.
Authenticated users are routed to a protected dashboard with access controlled by subscription plan; free users are redirected to the upgrade page.
Users can view and select subscription plans and upgrade directly within the app, unlocking additional features.
The app supports theme switching, language and currency toggling, ensuring an accessible and global-ready experience.
PWA installation prompts allow users to install VAYRA on mobile devices with offline functionality maintained.
Throughout all key routes, error boundaries ensure smooth user experience with fallback UI on errors.
validation_criteria: Landing page shows exactly one VAYRA logo above the hero H1 with correct size and no duplicates.
SVG, favicon, and all PWA icon assets return HTTP 200 and are present in manifests with maskable attributes.
Hero logo animates fade+scale on load without layout shift (>0.1 CLS) and respects prefers-reduced-motion setting.
Authentication flows work without generic errors: email sign-up, sign-in, Google OAuth with proper Firestore user doc creation and friendly errors for edge cases.
Unauthenticated users accessing the dashboard are redirected to sign-in; plan gating redirects free users to upgrade page properly.
No console errors or network 4xx/5xx errors on main routes including landing, auth, dashboard, and upgrade pages.
Axe-core accessibility scans on landing and auth pages return zero critical violations.
Responsive layouts work on standard mobile (375x812) and desktop (1280x800) viewports without content overlap or clipping.
Lighthouse scores for mobile on landing and dashboard maintain ≥90 across performance, accessibility, best practices, and SEO.
Service worker registers only in production; app correctly supports offline caching without breaking asset updates.
Session persistence maintained across page reloads: user remains signed in after reload with no permission errors on Firestore reads/writes.
